id: As the fire neared, this 93-year-old knew she had to get out. Then her garbageman showed up.
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Eric Levenson, CNNUpdated 4:30 PM ET, Sat November 17, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)When Margaret Newsum saw the news that the Camp Fire was not far from her home, the 93-year-old knew she'd have to evacuate.
